body:
@josharian I think all that failure is saying is that GOOS=darwin GOARCH=arm GOARM=5 is unsupported (seems GOARM=6 is the same).  Fixing that finds all sorts of other failures (e.g. "GO386=xxx go tool 8g" panic()s, I don't think solaris/386 is supported, dragonfly/386 definitely isn't supported, ...) but I didn't reproduce the reported failure.

Did you mention me because of the comment "TODO(mwhudson): actually think about this."? Apologies for the vague comment but all I did was disable some code when -linkshared or -buildmode=shared is passed. I don't think that's the cause.
